hero_subheadline: Akluma creates a custom saving schedule for any goal. We remind you when it's time to save.
use_case_vacation_desc: Dream trip, family holiday, or weekend getaway
use_case_gadgets_desc: New phone, laptop, or the tech you've been eyeing
use_case_milestones_desc: Wedding, new baby, or your next big chapter
use_case_emergency_desc: Peace of mind when life throws surprises
use_case_learning_desc: School fees, courses, or investing in yourself
use_case_home_desc: Furniture, appliances, or making your space yours
feature_reminders_desc: Automatic email reminders keep you on track—no more missed savings days
feature_progress_desc: Visual progress bar shows exactly how close you are to your goal
feature_flexible_desc: Choose a target date or set your own saving amount—we calculate the rest
feature_currency_desc: Save in USD, EUR, GBP, TRY, XOF, and more—works wherever you are
feature_free_desc: No subscriptions, no credit card required—start saving today at no cost
feature_privacy_desc: We never sell your information—your financial goals are yours alone
Updated by user actions (marking as save: Tracks changes to status, amount, or date only
Name: Your name
update_profile_information: Update your account's profile information and email address.
saving_goal_reach_date: Date you will reach your goal
Item Price: Price  of the item you want to buy
pick_date_strategy_definition: Decide the date you want to reach your saving goal. Then, we will show you how much money you need to put aside on a regular basis to reach that goal.
enter_saving_amount_strategy_definition: Tell us how much money you want to put aside periodically, then we will tell you when you will reach that goal.
saving_amount_whole_numbers_only: You can put only numbers in this field. No comma, no dot, no letters
price_whole_numbers_only: You can put only numbers in this field. No comma, no dot, no letters
Final Total: Final amount you will have when you open your piggy bank
Extra Savings Tooltip Info: We rounded your savings amount to avoid dealing with fractional contributions in your periodic deposits. This extra amount comes from that adjustment.
Extra Savings Tooltip Info For Enter Sav: You'll save slightly more than needed because your periodic amount doesn't divide evenly into the target. This extra ensures you reach your goal.
paused_message: Piggy bank is paused. Activate it first to change the status of your savings.
piggy_bank_paused_info: You paused saving. When you decide to continue, simply activate your piggy bank.
piggy_bank_resumed_schedule_updated_info: You resumed your piggy bank and schedule updated.
You have successfully completed your sav: You have successfully completed your savings goal.
edit_cancelled_message: You cancelled editing. The changes you made weren't saved.
saving_reminder_message: This is a reminder for your saving #:saving_number of :amount :currency for your piggy bank ":piggy_bank_name" scheduled for today (:date).
saving_reminder_additional_message:
When you’ve put this amount aside, click the button above to open your piggy bank. If you’re not already logged in, you’ll be asked to sign in first.

Once you are on your piggy bank page, scroll down to the “Saving Schedule” table near the end and check the box next to your saving to mark it as complete.

If you haven’t saved yet, you can always come back and mark it later.
saving_reminder_unsubscribe_notice: If you would like to stop receiving these reminders, you can update your notification preferences in your piggy bank settings.
account_deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted with all its data.
piggybank.empty_state.title: No Piggy Banks Yet
piggybank.empty_state.message: Start saving for your goals today by creating your first piggy bank!
1. I am saving for a (required field): 1. I am saving for (required field)
2. Price of the item (required field): 2. The amount I want to save (required field)
3. Product link (optional field): 3. Product link if you are saving to buy something (optional field)
step1_name_placeholder: e.g. school fee, Samsung Galaxy S25, that awesome gadget for kitchen, or capital for launching business, ...
step1_details_placeholder: You can add notes or details about your saving goal here. For example: 'I'll keep the savings in the wooden box inside my wardrobe,' or 'I'll deposit the savings into my Bank of America account that I rarely use.'
step1_starting_amount_whole_placeholder: If you've already saved some money for this goal, enter the amount here and we'll include it when creating your savings plan.
I already saved some money Tooltip Info: If you've already saved some money for this goal, enter the amount here and we'll include it when creating your savings plan.
help_popup_message_part1: To ask anything about this product, simply drop me an email at
help_popup_message_part2: or click my name to send a message on LinkedIn.
However, your piggy bank is still: However, your piggy bank is still
short of your goal because you took out: short of your goal because you took out money earlier.
You can add money manually using the sec: You can add money manually using the section below to reach your goal, or leave it as is.
Money you added or took out: Money you added or took out
saving_marked_as_saved: Saving marked as saved! Completed items are shown at the bottom of your schedule (after pending items).
saving_marked_as_unsaved: Saving marked as pending! Pending items are shown at the top of your schedule (before completed items).
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Akluma (www.akluma.com). This is a personal project by Ubeydullah Keleş. The site is free to use.
terms.can_do_text: You can create virtual piggy banks to help yourself save money. You set your own goals, schedule savings, and optionally get reminder emails based on your schedule.
terms.cant_do_text: Don’t abuse the service — including spamming, scraping, or crashing the site by repeatedly creating and deleting piggy banks.
terms.data_text: You can delete your account at any time. All your data will be deleted permanently.
terms.guarantee_text: This is a personal project. I do not guarantee uptime or data availability.
terms.changes_text: You’ll be notified by email if I make any significant changes to these terms.
terms.contact_linkedin: or reach out on LinkedIn to
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collect_text: When you sign up, I collect your name, email, encrypted password, and timezone (from your browser).
privacy.why_text: To create your account, send reminders, and help you stick to your saving schedule.
privacy.emails_text: You’ll receive login-related and optional reminder emails. You can turn off reminders anytime in your profile.
privacy.cookies_text: Only essential cookies for login and session handling.
privacy.thirdparties_text: I use [Email Provider] for emails, Fly.io for hosting, Grafana for uptime logs, and Google Search Console for anonymous stats.
privacy.children_text: This site is not meant for children under 13. If you're a parent and believe your child signed up, contact me.
privacy.storage_text: Your data is hosted on Fly.io servers in Paris.
privacy.security_text: Passwords are encrypted. The site is HTTPS-secured using Let’s Encrypt certificates.
privacy.rights_text: You can edit or delete your personal data in your profile. No data export available.
privacy.changes_text: If the policy changes, I’ll notify you by email.
privacy.contact_linkedin: or reach out on LinkedIn to
auth.accept_terms: I agree to the Terms of Service.
auth.accept_privacy: I agree to the Privacy Policy.
extra_savings_note: This means you have saved more than your target!
starting_amount_numbers_only: You can put only numbers in this field. No comma, no dot, no letters.
piggy_bank_created_success: Your piggy bank has been created successfully. You will receive reminder emails on your saving days. Change that if you like in notification preferences in your profile.
manual_money_info_message: You can add or take out money from your piggy bank manually. This is useful if you want to adjust your savings based on unexpected expenses or income.
manual_money_manual_title: How to add money to your piggy bank manually
vault_piggy_bank_connect_success_message: Piggy bank connected to vault successfully.
vault_piggy_bank_disconnect_success_mess: Piggy bank disconnected from vault successfully.
vault_piggy_bank_already_connected_messa: This piggy bank is already connected to another vault.
Select a piggy bank to connect: Select a piggy bank to connect
Are you sure you want to disconnect this: Are you sure you want to disconnect this piggy bank?
This piggy bank is already connected to: This piggy bank is already connected to this vault.
vault_definition: You can create a vault and connect several of your piggy banks to it. This way, you can track the total savings of all of them in one place.
connect_piggy_bank: Connect a few piggy banks to this vault to track savings all in one place.
vault_cant_connect_status: You cannot connect your piggy bank to a vault when its status is :status
default_meta_description: Save money for your goals with Akluma's digital piggy banks. Track savings, set targets, and achieve your financial goals.
welcome_meta_description: Create digital piggy banks to save for your dreams. Set savings goals, track progress, and achieve financial success with Akluma's online savings tool.
Change your periodic saving amount. All: Change your periodic saving amount. All pending scheduled savings will be recalculated with the new amount.
Your completed savings will remain uncha: Your completed savings will remain unchanged.
Are you sure you want to recalculate you: Are you sure you want to recalculate your saving schedule? All pending scheduled savings will be replaced with new ones based on the amount you entered.
Cannot recalculate schedule for inactive: Cannot recalculate schedule for inactive piggy bank
New periodic amount must be greater than: New periodic amount must be greater than 0
No pending scheduled savings to recalcul: No pending scheduled savings to recalculate
New periodic amount must be less than re: New periodic amount must be less than remaining amount
Your saving schedule has been recalculat: Your saving schedule has been recalculated successfully!

Register or login to view and manage you: Register or login to view and manage your saved drafts.
guest_draft_save_description: Enter your email to save this draft. Register with the same email later to access it.
guest.step1.draft_info_banner: Not ready to register? That's okay. Save your draft on the last step with just your email. It won't be lost — when you sign up later, it'll be right there in your account.
Are you sure you want to delete this dra: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?
draft.empty_state.title: No Drafts Yet
draft.empty_state.message: You haven't saved any drafts. Start creating a piggy bank to save a draft.
draft.session_warning.title: Unsaved Progress
draft.session_warning.message: You're currently creating a piggy bank. Resuming this draft will discard your current progress.
You've reached the maximum limit of :lim: You've reached the maximum limit of :limit active or paused piggy banks. To create this piggy bank, you can either save it as a draft using the 'Save as Draft' button above, or
cancel some of your active or paused pig: cancel some of your active or paused piggy banks
